decision_conditions: The proposed amendment to the rear fenestration would not constitute a non-material amendment to the original planning permission 224553HH dated 12/01/2023 and is not consistent with the Protocol for Non-Material Amendments. As such, the proposed change would not fall within the remit of Section 96A of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended).
description: Application for a Non-Material Amendment (S.96a) for the proposed alteration to the rear fenestration at ground floor level in relation to planning permission 224553HH dated 12/01/2023 for 'Single storey, part two storey side extension, following demolition of existing side addition; relocation of the main entrance door; rear roof extension, and installation of two roof lights to side roof slope'
